Html:
Hi everyone,

I worked on a project of Excel's generation with the framework PHPExcel. I import an Excel model and put on it all of my datas.

When i downloaded and open it, all my datas are here at the good place, but I can't use "show before print" that closed my Excel.

Is it exist some method to configure and debug that ?

Thanks you for your ideas,

S0r4
"Print Peview" has nothing to do with PHPExcel, it's part of the MS Excel GUI application. Check that you have a printer set up, otherwise MS Excel doesn't allow you to do a print preview

I find the solution of my issue.

It's the Excel 2003 compatibility who crashed my preview and my print.

If i only make a generation on Excel 2007 that's work.

thank you for your help =)

S0r4
